== Yakaralahalli (610927) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Yakaralahalli is a village in the [[Madhugiri ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 481.64 hectares and harbouring 294 households with total population of 1200 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Gauribidanur]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 583 and female population is 617. Scheduled Caste Population is 17 and Scheduled Tribes population is 327. Census Location Code of the village is 610927<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 375 (64.32%)
* Literate female population: 279 (45.22%)
